message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be within my budget.
I understand your budget concerns, Bob, but $7,500 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $8,750? I'm confident you'll find it's worth every penny.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $8,750 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,200, but that's as high as I can go. I really need to make this purchase work.
